column4: Is there a general developer package that you can install that will cover most of the stuff you need to compile shit?
I woudl have to say  sudo apt-get install build-essential flex bison xlibs-dev x11proto-gl-dev libgl1-mesa-dev fontconfig libfreetype6-dev fontforge checkinstall
followed by  sudo apt-get install subversion pkg-config python perl g++ g++-multilib \
